titles.title: Sun Of My Soul (familiar tune nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sun of my soul Thou Savior dear It is not night if Thou be near O may no earth-born cloud arise To hide Thee from Thy servants eyes{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When the soft dews of kindly sleep My wearied eyelids gently steep Be my last thought how sweet to rest Forever on my Savior's breast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abide with me from morn till eve For without Thee I cannot live Abide with me when night is nigh For without Thee I dare not die{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}If some poor wandering child of Thine Has spurned today the voice divine Now Lord the gracious work begin Let Him no more lie down in sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Watch by the sick enrich the poor With blessings from Thy boundless store Be every mourner's sleep tonight Like infant's slumbers pure and light{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come near and bless us when we wake Ere through the world our way we take Till in the ocean of Thy love We lose ourselves in Thee above{/lang-eng}
